column1: Smoque BBQ////"Best bbq I've ever had" says my boyfriend. He also points out that he hasn't tried any bbq food outside Kentucky and Illinois. I'm not a big fan of bbq so I went with him and got simple chicken which was good but I know their highly rated because of their bbq. So I'm basing my rating mainly on my boyfriends experience. He loves the brisket
column3: and the ribs are the best! The ribs are his favorite he could eat all the ribs in the restaurant. He also loves the corn bread
column5: and bbq's sauce. He pretty much said everything on the menu was amazing.
